data.text: “God is very powerful; everyone should have an awesome respect for him;
◄Can anyone count the angels who are in his army in heaven?/No one can count the angels who are in his army in heaven.► [RHQ]
So, ◄how can God consider anyone to be righteous?/God certainly cannot consider anyone to be righteous.► [RHQ]
Consider this: God does not even consider the full moon to be bright,
So, ◄what about humans?/he does not consider humans to be important.► [RHQ]
